verses.verse: Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

"Speak<WH1696> to Aaron<WH175> and to his sons,<WH1121> and to all<WH3605> the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> to them, 'This<WH2088> is what<WH1697> <WH834> the Lord<WH3068> has commanded,<WH6680> saying,<WH559>

"Any<WH376> man<WH376> from the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> who<WH834> slaughters<WH7819> an ox,<WH7794> or<WH176> a lamb,<WH3775> or<WH176> a goat<WH5795> in the camp,<WH4264> or<WH176> who<WH834> slaughters<WH7819> it outside<WH4480> <WH2351> the camp,<WH4264>

and has not brought<WH935> it to the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> to present<WH7126> [it] as an offering<WH7133> to the Lord<WH3068> before<WH6440> the tabernacle<WH4908> of the Lord,<WH3068> bloodguiltiness<WH1818> is to be reckoned<WH2803> to that man.<WH376> He has shed<WH8210> blood<WH1818> and that man<WH376> shall be cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from among<WH7130> his people.<WH9415>

"The reason<WH4616> is so<WH4616> that the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> may bring<WH935> their sacrifices<WH2077> which<WH834> they were sacrificing<WH2076> in the open<WH6440> field,<WH7704> that they may bring<WH935> them in to the Lord,<WH3068> at the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> to the priest,<WH3548> and sacrifice<WH2076> them as sacrifices<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings<WH8002> to the Lord.<WH3068>

"And the priest<WH3548> shall sprinkle<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> on the altar<WH4196> of the Lord<WH3068> at the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting,<WH4150> and offer<WH6999> up the fat<WH2459> in smoke<WH6999> as a soothing<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to the Lord.<WH3068>

"And they shall no<WH3808> longer<WH5750> sacrifice<WH2076> their sacrifices<WH2077> to the goat<WH8163> demons<WH9618> with which<WH834> they play<WH2181> the harlot.<WH2181> This<WH2088> shall be a permanent<WH5769> statute<WH2708> to them throughout their generations.<WH1755>"'

"Then you shall say<WH559> to them, 'Any<WH376> man<WH376> from the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> or from the aliens<WH1616> who<WH834> sojourn<WH1481> among<WH8432> them, who<WH834> offers<WH5927> a burnt<WH5930> offering<WH5930> or<WH176> sacrifice,<WH2077>

and does not bring<WH935> it to the doorway<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> to offer<WH6213> it to the Lord,<WH3068> that man<WH376> also shall be cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from his people.<WH9415>

'And any<WH376> man<WH376> from the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> or from the aliens<WH1616> who sojourn<WH1481> among<WH8432> them, who<WH834> eats<WH398> any<WH3605> blood,<WH1818> I will set<WH5414> My face<WH6440> against that person<WH5315> who eats<WH398> blood,<WH1818> and will cut<WH3772> him off<WH3772> from among<WH7130> his people.<WH9415>

'For the life<WH5315> of the flesh<WH1320> is in the blood,<WH1818> and I have given<WH5414> it to you on the altar<WH4196> to make<WH3722> atonement<WH3722> for your souls;<WH5315> for it is the blood<WH1818> by reason of the life<WH5315> that makes<WH3722> atonement.<WH3722>'

"Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I said<WH559> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> 'No<WH3605> <WH3808> person<WH5315> among<WH4480> you may eat<WH398> blood,<WH1818> nor<WH3808> may any alien<WH1616> who sojourns<WH1481> among<WH8432> you eat<WH398> blood.<WH1818>'

"So when any<WH376> man<WH376> from the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> or from the aliens<WH1616> who sojourn<WH1481> among<WH8432> them, in hunting<WH6718> catches<WH6679> a beast<WH9130> or<WH176> a bird<WH5775> which<WH834> may be eaten,<WH398> he shall pour<WH8210> out its blood<WH1818> and cover<WH3680> it with earth.<WH6083>

"For [as for the] life<WH5315> of all<WH3605> flesh,<WH1320> its blood<WH1818> is [identified] with its life.<WH5315> Therefore I said<WH559> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> 'You are not to eat<WH398> the blood<WH1818> of any<WH3605> flesh,<WH1320> for the life<WH5315> of all<WH3605> flesh<WH1320> is its blood;<WH1818> whoever<WH3605> eats<WH398> it shall be cut<WH3772> off.<WH3772>'

"And when any<WH3605> person<WH5315> eats<WH398> [an animal] which<WH5038> dies,<WH5038> or is torn<WH2966> [by beasts], whether he is a native<WH249> or an alien,<WH1616> he shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> in water,<WH4325> and remain<WH2930> unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening;<WH6153> then he will become<WH2891> clean.<WH2891>
"But if<WH518> he does not wash<WH3526> [them] or bathe<WH7364> his body,<WH1320> then he shall bear<WH5375> his guilt.<WH5771>"
